sentences.english: Make honey water by mixing one teaspoon of honey in two cups of warm water.
sentences.chinese: 两杯温水混合一茶匙的蜂蜜蜂蜜水。

sentences.english: Place a quarter-size spoonful of filling in the center of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 勺起四分之一茶匙的馅料放在皮的中央。

sentences.english: Take two teaspoonfuls of the medicine after meals.
sentences.chinese: 每顿饭后吃两茶匙的药。

sentences.english: The other medicine is for his cough. Gie him one teaspoonful three times a day.
sentences.chinese: 另一种是止咳药水，每次一茶匙，一天三次。

sentences.english: Suggested Use Take one teaspoon one to three times daily or as directed by your healthcare practitioner.
sentences.chinese: 服法以一茶匙每日一至三次，或由您的保健医生指示。

sentences.english: Your limit should be 1, 500 milligrams of sodium per day, about theamount in three-fourths of a teaspoon of salt.
sentences.chinese: 你的极限是每天1500毫克钠，约四分之三茶匙盐。

sentences.english: Add a teaspoonful of sugar and the same quantity of salt.
sentences.chinese: 加一茶匙的糖和等量的盐。

sentences.english: To increase its life add 1 teaspoon vodka.
sentences.chinese: 加1茶匙伏特加可以延长保存期限。

sentences.english: Open coconut milk, put a little (around 5 table spoons) on the heating pan.
sentences.chinese: 开棷奶罐，倒约5茶匙份量的棷奶在热锅上。

sentences.english: Please help me put a teaspoon of salt in the soup.
sentences.chinese: 请帮我在汤里放一茶匙的盐。

sentences.english: We need two cups of yogurt and three teaspoons of honey.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要两杯酸乳酪和三茶匙蜂蜜。

sentences.english: A teaspoonful of my mother-in-law 's wild strawberry jam will entirely satisfy your jam desire .
sentences.chinese: 尝一茶匙我岳母做的草萄酱就能完全满足你的果酱欲。

sentences.english: Add two cups milk and some ice. Blend and drink.
sentences.chinese: 加入一茶匙香草精，两杯牛奶和冰块，搅拌，饮用。

sentences.english: You can use it to blot a teaspoon of fat off a pizza slice.
sentences.chinese: 您可以用它来吸干比萨饼中一茶匙的脂肪。

sentences.english: For post menopausal women, take 3 teaspoonfuls daily, after a meal.
sentences.chinese: 绝经妇女，餐后服用3茶匙15ml，一天一次。

sentences.english: Heat 3 tbsp of the oil in a wok, and stir-fry the pork briefly. Remove.
sentences.chinese: 在炒菜锅中热3茶匙油，并简单炒下猪肉。

definition: spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
